example.text: This predictably resulted in the highest inflation in four decades. American families have had to bear the brunt of this crisis, yet my colleagues on the other side of the aisle still seem to have no plan to tackle inflation outside of spending more taxpayer money.

Proud to join [[user]], Senator [[user]], & [[user]] in introducing the bipartisan Bring Our Heroes Home Act. The bill would expedite and coordinate the collecting, declassifying, and making public records of POW/MIA service members. [[url]]

Constituent Corner As the House and Senate welcomed President Isaac Herzog of Israel to a joint session of Congress last month, I was thankful that Idahoans with the Christians United for Israel could visit with my staff and I about the importance of American-Israeli relations.
